Content:: The 2022 E3 Saxo Bank Classic was a road cycling one-day race that took place on 25 March 2022 in Belgium. It was the 64th edition of the E3 Saxo Bank Classic, and the 9th event of the 2022 UCI World Tour. Twenty-five teams were invited to the race, including all nineteen UCI WorldTeams and six UCI ProTeams.[2] UCI WorldTeams UCI ProTeams This cycling race article related to Belgian cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
